text: Ndithudi nthawi zambiri Ife takhala tili kukuona uli kuyang’ana kumwamba. Ndithudi Ife tidzakulamula kuti uziyang’ana ku mbali yimene idzakukondweretsa iwe, motero yang’anitsa nkhope yako kumene kuli Mzikiti woyera ndipo kuli konse kumene muli yang’anani nkhope zanu komweko. Ndithudi iwo amene adapatsidwa Buku kale amadziwa kuti ichi ndi choonadi chochokera kwa Ambuye wawo. Ndipo Mulungu saiwala zomwe muchita
